publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2732 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Justice and Assistance (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2002-That the Justice 1 Committee, in consideration of the draft Advice and Assistance (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2002, recommends that the regulations be approved.
